text: tannalute vasamulla vedatte satyappetuttunna grantham ‎daivattilninn avarkk vannetti. avarea, ‎atinumump attarameannilute avisvasikale ‎parajayappetuttanayi prarthikkaruntayirunnu. ‎ennittum avarkk nannayariyavunna a grantham ‎vannettiyappeal avaratine tallipparannu! ‎atinal daivasapam a satyanisedhikalkkatre. ‎
